alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila County, Tonto National Forest Foothills (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 29 at 11:58AM MST until September 30 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM MST SATURDAY FOR STRONG WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND HIGH FIRE DANGER FOR SOUTHERN GILA COUNTY AND HIGHER ELEVATIONS OF NORTHERN PINAL AND NORTHEASTERN MARICOPA COUNTIES... * AFFECTED AREA...Southern Gila County/Tonto National Forest Foothills. * TIMING...Late Saturday morning through early Saturday evening. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 12 percent. * IMPACTS...Fuels are dry to very dry and fire danger is high. These conditions combined with low relative humidity and strong winds will lead to widespread hazardous fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials and fire crews in the field of this red flag warning.

area.areaDesc: Southern Gila County, Tonto National Forest Foothills
